text: The University of Waterloo is in the Southwest of Ontario. This university is marked the 5th best university in Canada. This university is very large. It was founded in 1957. ==Contests== The University of Waterloo holds many contests in mathematics for students in high school. Some contests let you choose the correct answer out of many wrong answers ( multiple choice ), and for other contests one must write the whole answer and how it was found. Anybody in Canada can take these contests. Each contest is named after famous mathematicians, such as Galois or Fermat. ==Notable people== *Walter Benz *David Johnston *Robert Mundell *Donna Strickland == Related pages == *One instruction set computer ==References== *cemc.uwaterloo.ca *http://www.4icu.org/ca/ *http://www.4icu.org/reviews/618.htm Category:1956 establishments in Canada
title: University of Waterloo
